snippet: HUNT--Walter. Condolences to Judy and to Walter Hunt's family. Among Walter's many legacies was his instrumental role in the founding and funding of the Center for Architecture. His vision and tireless energy brought the CFA to its seminal role today as a center of information about the built environment. Walter's leadership in the profession was inspiring to everyone he knew. He will be greatly missed. Rolf Ohlhausen 1/3
lead_paragraph: HUNT--Walter. Condolences to Judy and to Walter Hunt's family. Among Walter's many legacies was his instrumental role in the founding and funding of the Center for Architecture. His vision and tireless energy brought the CFA to its seminal role today as a center of information about the built environment. Walter's leadership in the profession was inspiring to everyone he knew. He will be greatly missed. Rolf Ohlhausen 1/3
